content:
My family and I
 Wako Joshua and Cornelius
 Gulere 
 English 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 My dinosaur and I 
 
 lok at my birds in the sky. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 1  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 My birds and I 
 
 met Chimpanze in the 
 
 tre. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 2  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 My chimpanze and I 
 
 play with my girafes on 
 
 the hil. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 3  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 My girafes and I 
 
 make monkey bals from 
 
 clay. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 My monkey and I eat 
 
 bananas with Gorila every 
 
 day. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 5  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 My gorila and monkey fear 
 
 Tortoise in every way. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 6  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Tortoise and I 
 
 go home very slowly with 
 
 Snake. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 7  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Snake and I 
 
 love to his and sing songs 
 
 by the lake. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 8  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 My entire family and I 
 
 live together in great 
 
 hapines! 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 9
